members.name: Saura Naderi
members.bio: Leading innovative research in robotics and human-computer interaction, with a focus on accessible technology and interdisciplinary collaboration.

members.name: Alex Johnson
members.bio: Specializes in machine learning and computer vision applications for robotic systems. PhD in Computer Science from Stanford University.

members.name: Morgan Chen
members.bio: Focuses on embedded systems and IoT integration in robotic platforms. Experienced in real-time control systems and sensor fusion.

members.name: Jordan Lee
members.bio: Research interests include swarm robotics and distributed autonomous systems. Background in electrical engineering and control theory.

members.name: Casey Rivera
members.bio: Works on human-robot interaction and assistive robotics. Passionate about designing accessible technology for diverse user communities.

members.name: Sam Taylor
members.bio: PhD candidate researching bio-inspired robotics and soft robotics. Exploring novel actuation methods and compliant mechanisms.
